Articles.Content: [Heh. That's why threads like this one aren't really feasible in a long term. Everybody ends up in their own universe, doing what they want]

Oh, Sampa! Sir! The ship is safe [kinda]. I stopped the destructive reaction at the core. I'm currently at... level B1 section 22. Do you know how I can get out from here? Many of the exits are blocked off.
I fall from the Multiverse. Into The Universe.

The loss of laythe in battle will be felt hard a nd he will be remembered deeply. But there is cause to rejoice as the tau ceti empire has accepted the offer to join the alliance as well. In memory of laythe, a seftion of the research wards shall forever be known as the laythe research wards.
Xannari, tell me! Do you or do you not have something to do with my collapse? this could destroy security!

I am in a space station.

I can sense the flow of reality, but I cannot shape it anymore.

> 
> Oh, Sampa! Sir! The ship is safe [kinda]. I stopped the destructive reaction at the core. I'm currently at... level B1 section 22. Do you know how I can get out from here? Many of the exits are blocked off.

Turns side arm on xannari, i know who are...xannari...

A Space Station

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Sampa, do you know what's going on with Dark?

I removed his conciousness and placed it in the Multiverse. Then I restored him.

> 
> Turns side arm on xannari, i know who are...xannari...

Hmm? Oh, there you are, sir. Are you alright?

Hmm... It appears you've got a burn mark right beside your left eye. That looks painful... Let me see if I have anything here...
sorry, paranoia is a side effect of reality shift, I guess.. Sorry sampa. Well, BOT platoon 7 aid Sampa now
Don't you play coy with me...NO one on this ship is allowed to call me by first name...you are under arrest, xannari.

BOT platoon 7, escort Xannari to a cell.

- - - Updated - - -

Meanwhile, the citadel meeting starts at post 415
Let's get off this ship...
Okay.
At the citadel, junior, you made sure she was placed in stasis?

> 
> Don't you play coy with me...NO one on this ship is allowed to call me by first name...you are under arrest, xannari.

I do apologize, I spoke out of position. I was just worried of your condition. I have something for that burn mark up there. Applying this should freeze cellular degradation, taking away the pain and making repairs quickly. Let me put that right there... And... Bingo!

**The mark slowly reverts to a natural skin-toned look**

Who were you looking for, again?

[Okay, this is getting out of hand a little. My statement will stand or I will leave on account of getting no response time]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-14T09:53:07Z" title="07/14/2015 09:53  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 14, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

Yep. And BOT platoon 5 is guarding her. At first sign of escape, the stasis tank will knock Xannari unconscious with a jolt of electricity.

- - - Updated - - -

Anyway, first order of business: What's the long-term solution for the Xannari issue?

> 
> I do apologize, I spoke out of position. I was just worried of your condition. I have something for that burn mark up there. Applying this should freeze cellular degradation, taking away the pain and making repairs quickly. Let me put that right there... And... Bingo!
> **The mark almost slowly reverts to a natural skin-toned look**
> 
> Who were you looking for, again?

Grabs xannari's wrist and shatters the device creating the illusion.

[Check the texts from earlier. It is a projection from the computer, not an overlay device]

Ow... That hurts a little...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T18:42:06Z" title="07/13/2015 06:42  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**
I am alive.

Shudders remembering engagement...

Good. For now, an inquisition should be assembled...all female biotics.
I think Xannari should be sent to prison to life. Any idea, Sampa?
I find myself in the council room, in the Citadel.

> 
> I think Xannari should be sent to prison to life. Any idea, Sampa?

I'm not so sure, here is a neural scan i made during that brief encounter...her mind is fighting against...something...i'm betting the attractor is key to all of this place her in a cell and we can test differing interferences.

Welcome, Laythe dwelller. Any ideo how to deal with Xannar?

- - - Updated - - -

I'll assign my best scientists to this issue.
